${ModID}:ChainShotgun.NAME: Chain Shotgun
${ModID}:ChainShotgun.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 to a random enemy !M! times。

${ModID}:Despair.NAME: Despair
${ModID}:Despair.DESCRIPTION: Counts as a Curse. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:EatWithoutTable.NAME: Eat Without Table
${ModID}:EatWithoutTable.DESCRIPTION: Drink a random common Potion. Add a *Despair to your hand. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Luciferium.NAME: Luciferium
${ModID}:Luciferium.DESCRIPTION: {@@}获得 [E] [E] . NL 获得 5 力量 。 NL 获得 !M! ${ModID}:Addiction. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Pyromaniac.NAME: Pyromaniac
${ModID}:Pyromaniac.DESCRIPTION: 你的回合开始时， set a random card in your h并${ModID}:On_Fire。
${ModID}:Pyromaniac.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL 你的回合开始时， set a random card in your h并${ModID}:On_Fire。

${ModID}:KillThirst.NAME: Kill Thirst
${ModID}:KillThirst.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If this doesn't kill the enemy, add a *Despair to your hand。

${ModID}:SpikeTrap.NAME: Spike Trap
${ModID}:SpikeTrap.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Deal that much damage to the next enemy that attacks you。

${ModID}:Catharsis.NAME: Catharsis
${ModID}:Catharsis.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add a *Despair to your hand. The next {!M!|1=card|@=!M! cards} you play {!M!|1=costs|@=cost} 0 并{!M!|1=plays|@=play} twice. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:TradeBeacon.NAME: Trade Beacon
${ModID}:TradeBeacon.DESCRIPTION: The first time you 抽 or 丢弃 during your turn, 抽 !M! 张牌。

${ModID}:BurningPassion.NAME: Burning Passion
${ModID}:BurningPassion.DESCRIPTION: Double the first buff you 获得 during your turn。

${ModID}:TaintedWeapon.NAME: Tainted Weapon
${ModID}:TaintedWeapon.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 战斗开始： Put this card in a random monster。

${ModID}:RimworldKeywordManager.NAME: KeywordManager
${ModID}:RimworldKeywordManager.DESCRIPTION: Stuff for translations 并easy access to keyword ids
